title: Title
story: A short, descriptive name for the story
mediaAssets: Media assets associated with the story
mediaTypes: Can be images, documents, video, or audio files.
locationDescription: A short description about a location
orPlace: or place associated with the story
inDepthDescription: An in depth description of the story
mentioned: People and communities that are mentioned
contributorDescription: A Contributor is the person or people who contributed
contributorTip: to the submission of the story into the archive
collectionTip: A Collection is a grouping of stories
relatedStories: Related stories are stories that have a close connection
guideViewers: and are used to guide viewers from one story to another
extraContent: Extra context about the story or the story creation process
physicalDigital: The specific physical or digital form of the story or artefact
uniqueIdentifier: A unique, unambiguous reference to the story
sourceProvides: Source provides a reference to the resource or institution
sourceOriginated: from where the story is contributed or originated
languageTip: The language that the information or media asset has been provided
translationTip: Transcription is a plain text field used to provide a text transcription or translation
translationFormat: of an audio or video recording, or of text in an image or document
access: Only you will have access to this record
